title: Is Reksai OP?
body: I just played a match where I was Darius running full DMG vs enemy Reksai. Level 1 no minions. I've never played as Reksai but I got him to around 75% HP before he even started trading back...and I ignited him and he didn't. I died. What??? No room for outplays...all AAs and 1 cast of our single ability.

replies.body: if it was your ability that brought her to 75% than it seems like a pretty fair trade considering her lvl 1 ability procs 3 times

> [{quoted}](name=UberAffe,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=ZfAMMLNf,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2015-01-07T04:43:28.396+0000)
>
> if it was your ability that brought her to 75% than it seems like a pretty fair trade considering her lvl 1 ability procs 3 times

Very reasonable. I never played her and don't know her kit. Sounds crazy strong for lvl 1 though.


> [{quoted}](name=MyosinFlare,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=ZfAMMLNf,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2015-01-07T05:12:49.385+0000)
>
> Ignoring the fact that you're bronze and most likely outplayed yourself, Rek is over tuned right now.

Nothing like a good ol' smartass on GD. I am not Bronze I just don't play ranked. My MMR in normal is mid gold so I don't know where you get your info from.

eh, she could be
theres also the factor of how new she is
everyone called rek sai and azir an... ALL the new champions op until people got use to the and it wasnt so bad anymore...

Ignoring the fact that you're bronze and most likely outplayed yourself, Rek is over tuned right now.

She's manaless, has high mobility, an overloaded kit, and high burst. Does that sound like any recent champion(s) to you?

> [{quoted}](name=MyosinFlare,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=ZfAMMLNf,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2015-01-07T05:12:49.385+0000)
>
> Ignoring the fact that you're bronze and most likely outplayed yourself, Rek is over tuned right now.

...You do know that bronze is not a reflection of skill level and it is just a placement right?
Almost every one (Gnar, Yasuo) and guess who Lee sin. All people who were op on release/ are op currently.
